overview: One thing’s for sure, you can take a Czech boy anywhere in the world – in this case the Caribbean – but he’ll still be a Czech boy. In other words, he’ll still be a complete and utter bitch for cock! As this group of hyped-up lads from Prague prove time and time again as they trawl the Dominican Republic for the hardest, horniest action that the natives can provide. Mike James, Jaro Stone, Sven Laarson and new-boy Carl Ross prove that when it comes to creaming those dicks, there’s no-one to touch the dudes from the Staxus slut factory!
title: Close Cut
